content: **the pride doodles** were created to support the pride and visiblility of all members of the queer community including our employees and family members choose any flag or flags that represent you to add to your next doodle project **24 pride doodle motifs** include the progress pride lgbt pride original pride philidelphia pride bisexual asexual pansexual polysexual lesbian gay transgender aromantic neutrois agender bigender demigender demisexual intersex nonbinary genderqueer genderfluid omnisexual genderflux queer pride and more this collection was designed in collaboration with leading men fiber arts 1 pacific knit co has made this pattern available for free for anyone to make show their pride check out #pkcpridedoodle for more inspiration the doodle cup cozy pattern is worked in the round on small circumference needles magic loop or dpns begin with a short ribbing work your colorwork and end with a short ribbing this is a **doodle series pattern** which means it includes micro charts intended to be used as mix-and-match colorwork motifs throughout the project or you can substitute any other doodle charts **size s ** one size **yarn** any dk light worsted or sport weight yarn in 2-3 colors approx 15-20g per cozy sample uses leading men fiber arts 2 dramaturg dk 100% superwash merino 115g 250 yards 228meters **needles** us 5/3 75 mm or size needed to obtain gauge 8 in 20 cm circular needles magic loop or dpns **gauge** 24 sts and 24 rounds per 4 in 10 cm in colorwork **notions** 2 stitch markers one in different color scissors & tapestry needle **sharing** please share progress photos and finished projects using #pkcpridedoodle and @pacificknitco 1 https //www leadingmenfiberarts com/ 2 https //www leadingmenfiberarts com/
